ac:macro.ac:plain-text-body:
data/curves = c1 c2
data/c1/title = Europe data/c1/x = 1998 1999 2000 2001 2002 data/c1/y = 31 32 44 61 55
data/c2/title = Asia data/c2/x = 1998 1999 2000 2001 2002 data/c2/y = 54 59 50 31 38
plot/coordinateSystem/xAxis/minimum = 1997.5 plot/coordinateSystem/xAxis/maximum = 2002.5 plot/coordinateSystem/xAxis/ticLabelFormat = %d% plot/coordinateSystem/xAxis/axisLabel = year
plot/coordinateSystem/yAxis/minimum = 0 plot/coordinateSystem/yAxis/maximum = 100 plot/coordinateSystem/yAxis/axisLabel = sold
